description:
iOrienteering combines the convenience of a smartphone with the challenge of orienteering. As well as using QR barcodes to load the course, start, finish and read checkpoints, you can now use your device's GPS to detect your location.

iOrienteering allows both score and point to point (linear) courses. Checkpoints can now be used multiple times, so Phi or Butterfly loops can be created

You can set up private or public course. 

Private if just for you, your friends, a school or club. Public if anyone can take part.

Simple and great fun. It is free to use. Although designed for orienteering it can be used in any situation where you would like to time or score an event, or you simply what to show someone has traveled to a specific location. 

For a fun example, you could use it on a stag night with a barcode at each pub or on a car navigation event to show various points have been visited. 

If you use the app for something unusual then tell us about it as we'd love to hear about it.

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

In the Citysport app, all your essentials are in one place. Join our community and get access to the coolest sporting events, news and offers! 


Citysport äpis on kõik sinu olulised asjad ühes kohas. Liitu meie kogukonnaga ning saa osa kõige vingematest üritustest, uudistest ja parimatest pakkumistest!


Citysport lietotnē viss nepieciešamais ir vienuviet. Pievienojies mūsu kopienai un iegūsti piekļuvi stilīgākajiem sporta pasākumiem, jaunumiem un piedāvājumiem!


Citysport programėlėje visi tavo svarbiausi dalykai – vienoje vietoje. Prisijunk prie mūsų bendruomenės ir gauk prieigą prie šauniausių sporto renginių, naujienų ir pasiūlymų!

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries

•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy

Step into the Octagon with the official UFC app—home to UFC FIGHT PASS, the exclusive streaming service of the UFC and your gateway to premier combat sports.

Experience the thrill of live UFC events, access an unrivaled fight library, and enjoy exclusive programming that brings you closer to the action.

UFC FIGHT PASS: The Ultimate Combat Sports Destination

	•	Historic Archive: Explore classics from PRIDE, Strikeforce, WEC, and 50+ organizations.
	•	Original Programming: Go deeper with hit series and original programming like Fightlore and Year of the Fighter.
	•	Multi-Device Access: Watch on smartphone, tablet, computer, or smart TV.

Subscription Menu
	•	UFC FIGHT PASS is available as a monthly or annual subscription plan.
	•	Payment will be charged to your iTunes/Apple Account at confirmation of purchase.
	•	All subscriptions auto-renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

UFC Pay-Per-View

Content & Availability
	•	Content and features vary by region, blackout restrictions, and holdback windows.
	•	Learn more: ufc.com/faq-ufctv-ufcfightpass
	•	Terms of Use: ufc.com/terms

Download the official UFC app today and unlock the ultimate combat sports experience—live fights, historic battles, and exclusive content, all in one place.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Sportity is a Sport Event Information Distribution App for all kinds of sport events. The app helps organisers to distribute event related information to all the participants quickly and efficiently.

Participants can be divided into different categories so that they receive information only relevant to them. For example, Media will have its own category for their specific needs (media shuttle schedule, press center opening times etc). The organising committee will have its own information available through the app and teams all the information relevant for them. In addition to specific information, all users can have results, starting times etc available through the app.

Participants need to download the app and enter a password which will take them directly to the information according to their profile. The password will be made available from the organiser.

The organiser needs to contact Sportity Ltd for the use of the app.

Tournated is the ultimate sports management solution, we call it, Shopify for Sports Management. Designed to empower athletes, organizers, and federations. Authenticate to view and personalize your tournaments, leagues, and events. 

Create custom experiences with features like team draws, group formations, and tournament filters. Manage clubs, coaches, organizations, and leagues while tracking rankings and live scores. 

Stay updated with news, explore galleries, and customize your app by selecting your sport. With multilingual support, Tournated ensures inclusivity for all users. Simplify sports management and elevate your events today!

In Veo Live you can watch live sports streaming from teams and clubs around the world, as it happens.

This means that you can watch your kids, your friends, or your local heroes perform like never before.

When a club live-streams using a Veo camera, their followers receive a notification which will take them straight to the action in the Live App.

Even more, you can beam this up onto larger devices via Chromecast or Airplay to really amplify the live experience!

Come and discover new teams. Discover new athletes. Build your live sports community through the Veo Live app.

Get ready to step up your fitness levels with our user-friendly step challenge app! Whether you are a fitness enthusiast or just starting your wellness journey, our app is designed to motivate towards heathier lifestyle and add some adrenaline rush by competing with others! Participate anytime and anywhere that suits you best!

With our app, you can easily track your daily steps, distance and burned calories, and compete with other participants, or with your friends and colleagues. Our intuitive interface and user-friendly features make tracking and analyzing your progress effortless.

Discover a variety of step challenges designed to fit your interests and fitness level. From themed challenges to team competitions, there is always something challenging and exciting happening in our app. Stay motivated with real-time updates, leaderboards, and friendly competitions that will push your limits.

Join like-minded community that shares a passion for daily fitness competitions! Download our app now and step-by-step reach your goals! Challenge yourself and others!

This app provides the simplest and fastest way to upload workouts that are stored on iOS device, by reading the tracking and heart-rate data from HealthKit. This means that exporting is not limited to workouts recorded with the Apple Watch. Any workout visible in the Health app, regardless of how it was recorded, can be sent to Distantrace.com. App also read Daily Activity data (steps, distance & active calories) from HealthKit and send this data to distantrace.com.

The YB Tracking iPhone/iPad app allows you to follow live race
tracking on your mobile - updated to feature everything we track
including yacht races, car rallies, adventure racing and more.

Information in the race viewer is also controlled by the race
organisers - not YB Tracking. For instance, if a race organiser has
not provided pictures for the teams, then pictures will not appear in
this app or on our web-based viewer.

Key features:

- See information about the teams in the race
- View live leaderboards
- Review the map, course and wind info (where available)
- Zoom to all teams, leaders, and the course area
- Social media feed with news about the race
- Replay facility, to allow you to scrub backwards and forwards in time

Note: This app requires an internet connection to operate

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

SPLASHME – Your Swim Meet Buddy

Access live results, event timings, and swimmer updates with events using Splash Meet Manager. Dive into a global archive of swim competitions.

Features
	• Results and start lists live (if event supports)
	• Event times, heats, lane details
	• Scores, medals, and rankings
	• Follow top swimmers
	• Quick alerts for events and swimmer updates
	• Past results and swimmer history

Global Reach
SplashMe works with any event on Splash Meet Manager (swimrankings.net).
Live updates are provided if used by organisers.
Check upcoming events here:
https://splashme.app/swim-meets

Free Use – Upgrade Anytime
Start with free basics. Enjoy more with optional subscriptions:
	• Follow favourites and get alerts
	• Historic results and swimmer history
	• World rankings and top times

Accuracy of Data
All data (start lists, results, records) is from event organisers and may vary with their setup.

Privacy & Terms
https://splashme.app/terms
https://splashme.app/privacy

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule across national and local broadcast partners.*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.
- Watch original series that bring you inside the league
- Personalized live updates on your favorite teams and players
- Live free access to postgame press conferences after every game
- Play free games to test your basketball knowledge with NBA Play

* National broadcast partners include ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, and Amazon Prime Video. 

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.**
- Alternate streams including Data Mode and NBA Hoopervision
- Local language broadcasts
- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets
- Access to stream NBA TV
- Access to the NBA archives to stream the most memorable games and moments.

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:
- Gametime is anytime with download for later to watch NBA games on the go or offline.
- Commercial free viewing on up to 3 devices
- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

NBA ID has rewards for every fan. Sign up and get access to:
- Member-only benefits like free ticket giveaways and sports merch deals
- Free live game nights and exclusive content
- Daily fan perks during NBA ID Member Days
- Upgraded fan experiences at NBA events
- Voting on top league moments and influence the game
- Earning badges that show off your fandom

Play free games with NBA play to test your basketball knowledge and show how well you know the sport. Games include:
- Full Court Guess
- Hoop Connect
- NBA IQ
- NBA Rank
- Player Path
- NBA Blast
- Trivia

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Current NBA League Pass and NBA TV subscribers can access their subscription by logging into the App.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.

Please visit support.watch.nba.com to contact the support team if you are experiencing any issues.

The NHL App  dives into the 2025-26 season with a host of exciting new features, including:

– Stats, reimagined. We’ve got League Leaders, no doubt… and a whole lot more. Discover a Stats surface that incorporates EDGE Advanced Stats, Data Visualizations and even some fun facts and new ways of looking at the game. More modules rolling out as the season unfolds.

– Live Activities made its rookie (ok, beta) debut during the playoffs last season; it’s back and now fully-featured. Choose one game, or opt-in for any (or all!) teams so you can set it and forget it!

– How to Watch: There’s more ways than ever to watch a game, and we got you covered with our expanded feature – all the info to know where to stream, tune in or follow along.

– Navigation: We’ve rearranged the furniture a bit to let you jump directly to a Team or Player from our new Search bar, added tab bar-level access to Stats, and the evolution of the latest tab into your Home for all things hockey is underway.  

A refreshed and timely onboarding flow reviews your choices, setting you up to experience all the NHL App has to offer, just the way you like it: breaking news notifications, up-to-the-minute scores and live Gamecenter, new EDGE stats, Game Stories & video highlights, your favorite team’s icon and Goal Horn game alerts & much more. 

By downloading and using the NHL® app, you acknowledge and agree that (i) you have read, understood and agreed to be bound by the NHL.com Terms of Service (https://www.nhl.com/info/terms-of-service) and (ii) the information you provide will be handled in accordance with the NHL.com Privacy Policy (https://www.nhl.com/info/privacy-policy).  

Features and content within the NHL® app are subject to change.

Get ready to take your fut gaming experience to the next level with PACFUT! Our latest season is packed with exciting game modes that will challenge you and help you build the ultimate squad.

• Draft Builder: You can play draft simulator on the PACFUT Draft mode. Practice building the best draft squads by completing Draft Building Challenges. Join the Draft League and compete against other teams

•Open Packs: You can open different types of FUT Packs on the PAC FUT open packs mode. Many different types of packs are provided and many are added on each update and in the lightning rounds.

•Squad Building Challenges: SBC mode allows PAC FUT users to get creative and earn decent rewards. Users have a wide selection of dynamic scenarios to complete including Basic, Advanced, Nation, Club and League Challenges.

•Squad Builder:
•Daily Objectives: This challenges are an easy way to complete your collection. Keep your daily streak alive to earn better rewards. Daily challenges reset after 7 days of completion.

•Weekly Objectives: Complete weekly objectives in-game or in the web & companion app to earn new rewards. Complete draft, pack, SBC and skill battles challenges to earn rewards and boost your collection, the harder the challenge, the better the rewards you’ll receive. 

•Store: Store: Check out the latest FUT Packs and Player Picks updates without having to update the app. Keep up with the latest and player changes.


•Latest Players: Get the latest FUT players updates without needing to update the app.

ShowDown: **NEW** Play against the AI or other players in our newest mode, ShowDown. Get to know your players and plan your game to beat your opponents in One vs One ShowDown.


•Draft Battles: Coming Soon, we are working hard to complete this fun game mode

•Trading: You can now trade players and coins on the market. This can get you the coins you need to buy better players and complete your squad. Players' Favourite.

•Collections: Track all your card collections to according to clubs, nations and card types. This is an easy way to follow your progress
